ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ ποιητικῆς
ti:edition.ti:description: Aristotle. Aristotelis Opera, Vol. 11. Bekker, Immanuel, editor. Oxford, UK: Oxford University Press, 1837.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ ποιητικῆς
ti:edition.ti:description: Aristotle. Aristotelis De arte poetica liber. Kassel, Rudolf, editor. Oxford, UK: Clarendon Press, 1965 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Poetics
ti:translation.ti:description: Aristotle. The Poetics. "Longinus," On the sublime. Demetrius, On Style. Fyfe, William Hamilton, translator. London: William Heinemann Ltd.; Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1939 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: Ars Poetica
ti:translation.ti:description: Arisṭūṭālīs: Fann al-šiʿr, maʿa l-tarǧamah al-ʿarabīyah al-qadīmah wa-šurūḥ al-Fārābī wa-Ibn Sīnā wa-Ibn Rušd. ed. ʿAbd al-Raḥmān Badawī. Cairo, Maktabat al-nahḍah al-miṣrīyah, 1953.
